T02D2657:310a-3: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02D2657:310a-4: rgyud las rigs kyi bu zhes pa //
T02D2657:310a-5: sgrub pa po yi mtshan nyid de //
T02D2657:310a-6: dal 'byor theg chen rigs can no //
T02D2657:310a-7: snying rje shes rab lon tan ldan //
T02D2657:310a-8: byams dang snying rje ldan pa dang //
T02D2657:310a-9: dad cing bla ma la gus dang //
T02D2657:310a-10: skyabs su song zhing sems bskyed pa //
T02D2657:310a-11: dam tshig sdom ldan dbang thob pas //
T02D2657:310a-12: las kyi cho ga shes nas ni //
T02D2657:310a-13: dgon pa'i gnas sam grong gi mthar //
T02D2657:310a-14: las byas bde ba'i stan la 'dug / khrus byas gtsang ma'i gos can gyis //
T02D2657:310a-15: bdun po rnam par dag pa dang //
T02D2657:310a-16: tshad med bzhi sogs ldan par bsgom //
T02D2657:310a-17: chos rnams thams cad bdag med par //
T02D2657:310a-18: sems kyis bsgom par byas nas ni //
T02D2657:310a-19: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02D2657:310a-20: rang gi sa bon dbus bsams nas //
T02D2657:310a-21: dam tshig dag dang phyag rgya dang //
T02D2657:310a-22: bsam zhing de bzhin nyid du bya //
T02D2657:310a-23: rnal 'byor pas ni bsgyur bar bya //
T02D2657:310a-24: lha yi rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur //
T02D2657:310a-25: de nas rang gi sa bon dang //
T02D2657:310a-26: phyag rgya phyag rgyas de byin brlab //
T02D2657:310a-27: lha yi go rims ji bzhin du //
T02D2657:310a-28: sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02D2657:310a-29: rang nyid rang gi lhar bsgoms nas //
T02D2657:310a-30: mi 'khrugs mdun nam spyi bor bsam //
T02D2657:310a-31: bdag nyid mi 'khrugs par bsgoms nas ;
T02D2657:310a-32: / de nyid gsum sogs rang dang gzhan //
T02D2657:310a-33: bum pa mchod rten la sogs nang //
T02D2657:310a-34: rgya mtsho padma zla ba la //
T02D2657:310a-35: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
T02D2657:310a-36: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das 'dis //
T02D2657:310a-37: bdag gi mchod pa bzhes nas kyang //
T02D2657:310a-38: mchod pas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02D2657:310b-1: thal sbyar sor mo gnyis phyir bskyed //
T02D2657:310b-2: ta th'a ga todbha b'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02D2657:310b-3: dza: h'um bam ho: sa de nyid gdan la bzhugs pa la //
T02D2657:310b-4: mchod dang bstod dang bzlas pa bya //
T02D2657:310b-5: sgra dang sems dang gzhi la gzhol //
T02D2657:310b-6: lan lag bzhi dang dmigs pa gsum //
T02D2657:310b-7: gzhan don bsnyen pa byed pa ni //
T02D2657:310b-8: grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma'o //
T02D2657:310b-9: dngos grub bsgrub bya'i bzlas pa ni //
T02D2657:310b-10: dag dang shib bu rdo rje bzlas //
T02D2657:310b-11: yid kyi bzlas brjod bcas pa bzhi //
T02D2657:310b-12: me dang sgra dang sgra mtha' gsum //
T02D2657:310b-13: brjod pa med pa'i bsam gtan te //
T02D2657:310b-14: thun gsum dag tu bzlas pa dang //
T02D2657:310b-15: bstod nas mchod par gtor ma gtang //
T02D2657:310b-16: ye shes gshegs dang dam tshig bsdu //
T02D2657:310b-17: mi gnas bsod nams ster bar byed //
T02D2657:310b-18: sgra mthar thar ba ster bar byed //
T02D2657:310b-19: bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa byon nas zhes pas
T02D2657:310b-20: rang lhar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pas spyan drang ba
T02D2657:310b-21: dang // mchod pa dang bstod pa dang /
T02D2657:310b-23: bsgom pa byas pas dngos grub stsol bar gyur pa'o //
T02D2657:310b-24: chos nyid mnyam pa nyid las ma g-yos kyang //
T02D2657:310b-25: thugs rjes gtan du mya ngan mi 'da' zhing //
T02D2657:310b-26: phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa //
T02D2657:310b-27: bcom ldan mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2657:310b-28: bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gis sbar //
T02D2657:310b-29: brtsom [*brtson?] 'gras chen po'i me lces sdig pa sreg
T02D2657:310b-30: / nyi ma me shel zhugs la me 'byung ltar
T02D2657:310b-31: // mi yi lus la dngos grub stsol bar mdzad //
T02D2657:310b-32: 'di nyid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar //
T02D2657:310b-33: spyi bo'i gtsug tu kun gyis bkur bar 'os //
T02D2657:310b-34: ngan song rnam sel thar lam 'dis 'grub bo //
T02D2657:310b-35: rang gzhan mdun du bsgoms kyang dngos grub ster //
T02D2657:310b-36: mgon po mi 'khrugs ba sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon dzee t'a ris mdzad pa rdzogs so /
